statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_name, location_id FROM inventory_items WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE location_id = 2
SELECT item_id, item_name, location_id FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_id DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE item_name = 'Sword' AND location_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, player_id FROM inventory_items WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, location_id FROM inventory_items WHERE player_id = 3 AND location_id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY location_id ASC, item_name;
SELECT item_id, item_name, location_id, player_id FROM inventory_items WHERE location_id IS NULL;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory_items GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 1 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory;
SELECT player_id, item_id FROM player_inventory WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM item_catalog WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, location_id FROM item_catalog WHERE location_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM item_catalog WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, item_name, location_id FROM player_inventory JOIN item_catalog ON player_inventory.item_id = item_catalog.item_id;
SELECT item_name, location_id FROM item_catalog WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 2;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, location_id FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT location_name, item_name FROM locations INNER JOIN items ON locations.location_id = items.item_id;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE item_id = 3 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id = 2 OR location_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM items;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT item_id, name, rarity FROM items ORDER BY rarity DESC;
SELECT player_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT name, description FROM items WHERE rarity = 'legendary';
SELECT player_id, current_location_id FROM players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) FROM inventory GROUP BY item_id;
SELECT name, description FROM items WHERE rarity = 'legendary';
SELECT username, level FROM players ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM items WHERE rarity > 2 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE description LIKE '%mountain%';
SELECT username, level, location_id FROM player ORDER BY level DESC, username;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT items.name, player_inventory.quantity FROM items JOIN player_inventory ON items.item_id = player_inventory.item_id WHERE items.rarity > 3 ORDER BY items.name DESC;
SELECT p.username, ps.health, ps.attack, ps.defense FROM player p JOIN player_stats ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id WHERE p.level > 50 ORDER BY ps.health DESC;

SELECT player.username, items.name, player_inventory.quantity FROM player JOIN player_inventory ON player.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id WHERE player.location_id = 3 ORDER BY items.name ASC;
SELECT player.username, player.level, locations.name FROM player JOIN locations ON player.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE player.username LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY player.level ASC;
